cmp: 上 (on/on top/upon/first (of two parts)/previous or last (week, etc.)/upper/higher/above/previous/to climb/to go into/above/to go up)
mng: to yield, to permit, to let sb do sth, to have sb do sth, to make sb (feel sad etc)
